In the heat o=
f things yesterday, I did trigger my AllTest that had the
offending sub All=
Class's commented out. This had worked in the past
but it seems it did not =
yesterday. However, I cannot be sure. Testing
wasn't critical at the moment=
 (I had meant to call a different target
to jar and deploy), so I didn't re=
search. Possibly I was mistaken
about the state of the test.

Assuming I=
 am correct in identifying the failing class, no, there is

returns an int. I assert th=
at the value returned is what is expected.
The underlying class, likewise, =
is nothing very special. Testing via
other means demonstrates that it works=

m
